    • receipt

      public static void receipt(int pizzaSize, String crustType, String toppings, double cost, double tax, double total)
      This method displays final reciept of order
      Parameters:
      pizzaSize - the crust size as an int
      crustType - the crust type as a single character string
      toppings - the toppings as a string
      cost - the cost of the order
      tax - the tax of the order
      total - the total cost of the order (including tax)
